speaker: Morty
dialogue: Uh Rick what are we even talking about? What is a transformer

speaker: Rick
dialogue: Its a machine Morty, a machine for words. Imagine every word is a color okay You give this thing a sentence and it figures out which colors go together. It pays attention to the important ones and ignores the dumb ones. Thats a transformer. It just pays attention to words.

speaker: Morty
dialogue: So its like a super dictionary

speaker: Rick
dialogue: No Morty its not a dictionary. A dictionary is for morons who need to look things up. This thing understands context. It knows that bank can mean a place with money or the side of a river. It gets it. Its smarter than your principal.
